backend/main.mo: Motoko actor handling user profiles and camera repair job CRUD with access control checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a buttonâ€‘style update to JobsDashboardPage.tsx with related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend file paths with short descriptions for each component and page.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, authentication gate, app layout, and page routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication wrapper showing login screen or app content based on identity state.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and React Query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their name.
Main layout with header, login button, content region, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshing queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobs.ts: React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, updating, and deleting repair jobs, plus managing the caller's user profile.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and utility classes for the frontend.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, setting up QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering the App component.
frontend/src/pages/JobDetailsPage.tsx: Page to display a single job's details with loading/error states and actions like edit and delete.
frontend/src/pages/JobsDashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard listing all jobs with search, filtering, stats, and navigation to job creation or details.
frontend/src/pages/JobUpsertPage.tsx: Form page for creating or editing a repair job, handling form state, validation, and submission.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: React page showing app info and job statistics using data from useListJobs, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/utils/jobFiltering.ts: Provides a function to filter jobs by status and search text and sort them by jobId descending.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and layout settings with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
